attributes.action: Call on the BBC to immediately terminate its contract with Steve McClaren as a football pundit for Euro 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is affront to every England supporter for the country's publicly funded broadcaster to employ the very man responsible for the national team's failure to reach the tournament. Given that he neither looks nor sounds good on television and television and that he talks in convoluted management speak, the decision can only be based on his notoriety as a failed England manager--a further insult to the fan. This is BBC waste pure and simple.
